data.title: Celebrities on the Broadway Stage - Broadway Guide
data.meta_description: For decades, Broadway has welcomed film and TV's biggest stars as they headed to New York City for the chance to share in the intimate experience of perfor…
data.text:
For decades, Broadway has welcomed film and TV's biggest stars as they headed to New York City for the chance to share in the intimate experience of performing in front of a live audience. This Broadway season is no exception.

Here are some of the celebrities who are spending time on the Broadway boards this season.

Eddie Redmayne in Cabaret

Through September 14, 2024

The Kit Kat Club reopens its doors on Broadway starring Academy Award winner Eddie Redmayne as the Emcee. The electrifying new production of Kander and Ebb’s classic musical also features stage and screen favorite Bebe Neuwirth as Fraulein Schneider and Gayle Rankin as Sally Bowles.

Maia Reficco and Yola in Hadestown

Pretty Little Liars: Original Sin star Maia Reficco makes her Broadway debut as Eurydice in Anaïs Mitchell's Tony-winning musical. She's joined by British singer-songwriter and six-time Grammy Award nominee Yola as Persephone and original The Wiz star Stephanie Mills as Hermes.

Ariana Madix in Chicago

From August 1 through August 27, 2024

Vanderpump Rules star and Dancing with the Stars finalist Ariana Madix returns to Kander and Ebb's razzle dazzle musical as Vaudevellian murderess Roxie Hart after making her Broadway debut in the role earlier this year. Following her run, screen favorite Alyssa Milano will step into the role from September 16 through November 10.

Sutton Foster and Michael Urie in Once Upon a Mattress

Previews begin July 31, 2024; Opens August 12, 2024; Closes November 30, 2024

Sutton Foster and Michael Urie star in the revival of this beloved musical fairytale, back on Broadway for the first time for a limited late-summer run. Join Princess Winnifred as she charms, delights, and dances her way to the top… of a stack of mattresses.

Patti Lupone and Mia Farrow in The Roommate

Previews begin August 29, 2024; Opens September 12, 2024

Patti LuPone and Mia Farrow return to Broadway in Jen Silverman's witty and profound comedy about two women from vastly different backgrounds navigating the complexities of identity, morality, and the promise of reinvention.

Robert Downey Jr. in McNeal

Previews begin September 5, 2024; Opens September 30, 2024; Closes November 24, 2024

Academy Award winner Robert Downey Jr. makes his Broadway debut in Pulitzer Prize winner Ayad Akhtar's new work that examines the inescapable humanity – and increasing inhumanity – of the stories we tell.

Jim Parsons and Katie Holmes in Our Town

Previews begins September 17, 2024; Opens October 10, 2024

The Big Bang Theory star and Tony nominee Jim Parsons, stage and screenf avorite Katie Holmes and more lead a starry cast in Kenny Leon's production of Thornton Wilder's timeless, Pulitzer Prize-winning drama about life in the village of Grover’s Corners, New Hampshire.

Nicole Scherzinger in Sunset Boulevard

Previews begin September 28, 2024; Opens October 20, 2024

Multiple award-winning singer, dancer and former member of The Pussycat Dolls, Nicole Scherzinger, makes her Broadway debut as Norma Desmond in director Jamie Lloyd's thrilling revival of Andrew Lloyd Webber's musical navigating the intoxicating need for fame and adoration.

Kit Connor and Rachel Zegler in Romeo + Juliet

Previews begin September 26, 2024; Opens October 24, 2024; Closes January 19, 2025

Emmy winner and Heartstopper standout Kit Connor and Golden Globe winner and West Side Story star Rachel Zegler star as the title characters in a thrilling new production of Shakespeare's romantic tragedy. 13 Reasons Why's Tommy Dorfman makes her Broadway debut as Nurse & Tybalt.
